Class ContextMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dezibel.gui.ContextMenu

  • public class ContextMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the right click actions for all panels
    Author:
    Benny, Tobias, Henner, Bastian, Alex
